text:
Luce Douady (17 November 2003 – 14 June 2020) was a French climber. She became Youth World champion in 2019 and won the bronze medal at senior level at the 2019 IFSC Climbing European Championships.
Douady died at the age of 16, on 14 June 2020 after falling off a path on the way to a cliff near her home town of St. Bernard.Isère, France.
